parameter.name: contentvisible
parameter.help: This is set to true when a basetabelement begins to open and is set to false when it finishes its close. Default is the inverse of hideonclose.

parameter.name: headerheight
parameter.help: The height of the header. Default is minheight.

parameter.name: hideonclose
parameter.help: Content is automatically hidden when tabelement is closed. To override, set this attribute to false. Default is true.

parameter.name: itemclassname
parameter.help: When creating tabelements via additem, this is the class that gets created. The default value is the class of the first tabelement or its descendant.

parameter.name: minheight
parameter.help: The height the tab will close to. Default is 22.

parameter.name: onclosestart
parameter.help: Sent at the start of the close animation.

parameter.name: onclosestop
parameter.help: Sent at the stop of the close animation.

parameter.name: onopenstart
parameter.help: Sent at the start of the open animation.

parameter.name: onopenstop
parameter.help: Sent at the end of the open animation.
